results.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
results.reason: This verse reminds us that God is always with us, providing comfort in times of loneliness.
results.reflection: Even in solitude, God's presence is our constant companion.

results.text: God sets the lonely in families, he leads out the prisoners with singing; but the rebellious live in a sun-scorched land.
results.reason: It speaks to God’s ability to place the lonely within a community or family.
results.reflection: Trust that God will surround you with love and belonging.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse reassures us of God's support and presence in lonely times.
results.reflection: God’s strength is sufficient to lift us from the depths of loneliness.

results.text: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
results.reason: Jesus promises His eternal presence, offering solace to those who feel alone.
results.reflection: Jesus’ promise is our assurance that we are never truly alone.

results.text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
results.reason: This verse highlights God’s comforting presence even in our darkest moments.
results.reflection: In the valleys of loneliness, God’s comfort is our light.
